channel.title: Help with cache downloader!
channel.description:
Alright, i have this error: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/1sysew.png[/img]
I'd had problems with that errors before.. I hate client sided coding -.-'
Help would be appreciated!! <3 ;D
Das system kann den angegebenen Pfad nicht finden: The System cannot find the specific path
Zugriff verweigert = Permission denied

item.title: Help with cache downloader!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

-your link isn’t correct in update.java
-your link may have “www” in it take it out

Read full topic

item.title: Help with cache downloader!
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

[quote=“u loose, post:4, topic:529897”]Make sure your download link in cachedownloader.java is
Like this

dl.dropbox.com/blahblahblah
That can be one of the reasons as to why it cannot find mapconfig

As for the permission thing, you could change the directory to user-directory or something like that.

Google justins webclient tut and look at what he says to put in signlink.java

Enjoy[/quote]
Thanks for the tutorial, helped me alot. Cache download working fine, Unzipping is fine too, mapconfig.txt fixed too, now this:
=(
**btw. there is no URL.java

Read full topic

item.title: Help with cache downloader!
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

Make sure your download link in cachedownloader.java is
Like this

dl.dropbox.com/blahblahblah
That can be one of the reasons as to why it cannot find mapconfig

As for the permission thing, you could change the directory to user-directory or something like that.

Google justins webclient tut and look at what he says to put in signlink.java

Enjoy

Read full topic

item.title: Help with cache downloader!
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

its easy to fix

rezip the cache - upload to dropbox public - change the signlink & cachedownloader and enjoyyyyyy

Read full topic

item.title: Help with cache downloader!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

It’s trying to load the maps before everything else is down. Just have it to load maps afterwards I assume?

Read full topic
